Although this site has been temporary greened over, it previosuly contained Council Offices and car parking so is considered to be Brownfield. The capacity in this register reflects this part of the scheme only. Other residential elements are under construction (see 12/02500/REMM) and the original capacity of 450 units is no longer expected to materialise with a revised total of 130 units now expected"
